system.description:
Starting at 6th level, you can build ingenious inventions using your bonded artifact as a power source. Whenever you finish a long rest, you may select a spell from any spell list of 2nd level or lower. So long as you have this ingenious invention, you may cast your chosen spell as a wielder spell without expending any artifact charges. Whenever you do so, roll 1d4. If the result is equal to or lower than the chosen spellâ€™s spell level, your ingenious invention fizzles out and you can no longer cast your chosen spell.

You can fix your ingenious invention or choose a new spell and create a new one whenever you finish a long rest. If you attempt to create a new ingenious invention, any inventions previously created in this way break apart and are destroyed.

The maximum spell level of your ingenious inventions increases as you gain levels in this class, as shown on the Table: Ingenious Inventions.
